docs.snippet: An  On Baseball column  on Tuesday about the Yankees’ 8-2 loss to the Boston Red Sox referred incorrectly to Francisco Cervelli’s performance. He drove in the Yankees’ only runs; he did not have their one extra-base hit. (Kevi...
docs.lead_paragraph: An On Baseball column on Tuesday about the Yankees’ 8-2 loss to the Boston Red Sox referred incorrectly to Francisco Cervelli’s performance. He drove in the Yankees’ only runs; he did not have their one extra-base hit. (Kevin Youkilis had their only extra-base hit, a double.)

docs.abstract: Profile of Michigan men's basketball coach John Beilein, who, after coaching for some 35 years at eight programs at all levels, has finally reached the NCAA Final Four.
